charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F-CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-21:846-Distribute and possess with intent to distribute a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of a PVP, AM2201, UR-144, XLR11, JWH-122, Schedule I controlled substances analogues. (09-17-12)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Superseding Indictment filed 7/24/14. Judgment of Acquittal as to all counts of the Superseding Indictment filed 7/2/15; all remaining counts dismissed.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F-CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE.21:USC § 846-Knowingly and intentionally possessed with the intent to distribute a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of AM2201, a Schedule I controlled substance, and did aid and abet another in doing so. (09/17/12)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment of Acquittal as to all counts of the Superseding Indictment filed 7/2/15; all remaining counts dismissed.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F-CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE.21:846-Agreed to distribute and possess with intent to distribute a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of AM2201, a Schedule I controlled substance. (09-17-12)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Superseding Indictment filed 7/24/14. Judgment of Acquittal as to all counts of the Superseding Indictment filed 7/2/15; all remaining counts dismissed.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F-CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE;21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) and Title 18, USC §2-Knowingly and intentionally possessed with the intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of pentylone hydrochloride, a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of a PVP, a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of AM2201, and a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of JWH-122, all Schedule I controlled substance analogues. ((06/12/12)(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment of Acquittal as to all counts of the Superseding Indictment filed 7/2/15; all remaining counts dismissed

charges.charge_disposition: Superseding Indictment filed 7/24/14. Judgment of Acquittal as to all counts of the Superseding Indictment filed 7/2/15; all remaining counts dismissed.
